TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNodeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks Weitere Informationen zur Behandlung von Ereignissen finden Sie unter [NIB: Behandeln von Ereignissen](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). Die Ereignis kann auftreten, die nur bei einem Aufruf der Methode.The event can occur only when you call the method. ## Examples Im folgenden Beispiel wird die -Ereignis für die So drucken Sie verschiedene Eigenschaften eines unbekannten XML-Knotens, der beim Aufruf der Klasse Methode.The following example uses the event of the to print various properties of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the class's method. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LineNumber As Integer
public: property int LineNumber { int get(); };

summary.span: Ruft die Zeilennummer des unbekannten XML-Knotens ab.

span.span: Gets the line number of the unknown XML node.
The line number of the unknown XML node.

public: property int LinePosition { int get(); };

summary.span: Ruft die Position des unbekannten XML-Knotens in der Zeile ab.

span.span: Gets the position in the line of the unknown XML node.
The position number of the unknown XML node.

remarks.format: ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LocalName As String
public: property System::String ^ LocalName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Ruft den lokalen XML-Namen des gerade deserialisierten XML-Knotens ab.

span.span: Gets the XML local name of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: Der lokale XML-Name des gerade deserialisierten XML-Knotens.

span.span: The XML local name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die Eigenschaft gibt den lokalen Namen (auch bekannt als ein lokaler Teil) einen qualifizierten XML-Namen zurück.The property returns the local name (also known as a local part) of an XML qualified name. Die Eigenschaft entspricht der 1999 http://www.w3.org Spezifikation `Namespaces in XML`.The property conforms to the 1999 http://www.w3.org specification `Namespaces in XML`. ## Examples Im folgenden Beispiel wird die eines unbekannten XML-Knotens, der beim Aufruf der Klasse Methode.The following example prints the of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the class's method. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Ruft den Namen des gerade deserialisierten XML-Knotens ab.

span.span: Gets the name of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: Der Name des gerade deserialisierten Knotens.

span.span: The name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Examples Im folgenden Beispiel wird der Name des unbekannten Knotens, der aufgrund der Ereignis auftritt.The following example prints the name of the unknown node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NamespaceURI As String
public: property System::String ^ NamespaceURI { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Ruft den Namespace-URI ab, der dem gerade deserialisierten XML-Knoten zugeordnet ist.

span.span: Gets the namespace URI that is associated with the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: Der Namespace-URI, der dem gerade deserialisierten XML-Knoten zugeordnet ist.

span.span: The namespace URI that is associated with the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Examples Das folgende Beispiel gibt den URI des unbekannten XML-Knotens, der verursacht die Ereignis auftritt.The following example prints the URI of the unknown XML node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NodeType As XmlNodeType
public: property System::Xml::XmlNodeType NodeType { System::Xml::XmlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: Ruft den Typ des gerade deserialisierten XML-Knotens ab.

span.span: Gets the type of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: Der , der den gerade deserialisierten XML-Knoten darstellt.

span.span: The that represents the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die Enumeration gibt eine Beschreibung des Knotens deserialisiert wird.The enumeration returns a description of the node being deserialized. Beispielsweise gibt es "Kommentar" zurück, wenn der Knoten ein Kommentar ist.For example, it returns "Comment" if the node is a comment. ## Examples Im folgenden Beispiel wird eine Beschreibung des unbekannten Knotens, der aufgrund der Ereignis auftritt.The following example prints a description of the unknown node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ObjectBeingDeserialized As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ObjectBeingDeserialized { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: Ruft das Objekt ab, das gerade deserialisiert wird.

remarks.format: ## Examples Das folgende Beispiel gibt den Rückgabewert von der Methode bei der Methode trifft einen unbekannten XML-Knoten.The following example prints the value returned by the method when the method encounters an unknown XML node. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the text of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: Der Text des gerade deserialisierten XML-Knotens.

span.span: The text of the XML node being deserialized.
